notesStmt.note: Translated by W.B. (i.e. William Bedwell?), whose initials appear on the third leaf recto.
Identification of printers supplied and actual publication date conjectured by STC; Bill's name from colophon.
The maps were printed in Antwerp by the Officina Plantiniana; each is folded and has letterpress text on the back.
"Parergon, siue veteris geographiæ aliquot tabulæ" has separate title page.
The plate numbers appear to be hand-stamped in the catalogued copy.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
